timeline.message: Issue #761 Storage pricing services structure refactoring
Issue #761 Update tests according to services refactoring

timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.bodyText: Let's move totalMatches check to the start of the method
timeline.author: mzueva
mzueva

timeline.bodyText:
I think it is better to put index pattern into application.properties.
Why do we need * in index pattern? As fas as I remember all indices have aliases cp-$type-file-$id.
timeline.author: mzueva

replies.bodyText:
Extracted pattern to properties.
Indices contain a randomly generated string of 5 chars at the beginning.
replies.author: Wedds

timeline.bodyText: I'd suggest to parse prices into Object model instead of dealing with JsonNodes
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.bodyText: Currently this abstract class contains lot's of implemented methods and two abstract methods. Can we make AbstractStoragePricingService just StoragePricingService and extract all abstract methods into a separate interface with implementations for different providers? I think it will make code more readable.
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.bodyText: Please, use some more specific exception class
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.bodyText: I think it is better to actually return something from this method since it is called only form updatePrices method where you can assign prices to some inner field.
timeline.author: mzueva

replies.bodyText: Done, returning Map with pricing for regions from now
replies.author: Wedds

timeline.message: Issue #761 Storage pricing refactoring: extract prices loading process from abstract class to interface.
Issue #761 Parse AWS prices into POJO instead of working with JsonNode
Issue #761 Code refactoring (extracting common settings into its own fields, remove unused import).
Issue #761 AwsStoragePriceListLoader improvements (extract constants, refine JSON price list mapping)

timeline.bodyText: Do we really need this annotation if name of the property matches json field name?

timeline.bodyText: To prevent some common errors, we can set property FailOnUnknownProperties to false for this mapper. In this case parsing won't fail if some new fields will be added to AWS model.
timeline.author: mzueva
